address: Xã Phú Bình, Huyện Phú Tân, Tỉnh An Giang
thought:
**My Analysis of the Administrative Unit Change for "Xã Phú Bình, Huyện Phú Tân, Tỉnh An Giang"**

Okay, so I've been asked to find the new administrative unit for "Xã Phú Bình" in An Giang province.  First, I confirmed the province remains "Tỉnh An Giang," despite the brief consideration of a merger with Kiên Giang (60-NQ/TW).

Then, I focused on identifying the new "xã" (ward).  I knew I needed to search through the relevant resolutions related to administrative rearrangements in An Giang. I specifically looked for mentions of "Xã Phú Bình."  After a targeted search, I found it! Resolution 1654/NQ-UBTVQH15, specifically line 11, clearly states that "Xã Phú Bình" is being *merged* with other wards to form a new ward called "**Xã Bình Thạnh Đông**."  Perfect!

To be absolutely sure, I then verified that "Xã Bình Thạnh Đông" is indeed listed as a new ward within An Giang province, which it is. I'm building a JSON output to show the new information:  "Tỉnh An Giang" for the province, "Xã Bình Thạnh Đông" as the new ward name, and the associated code (30445).  I'll include the relevant citation from 1654/NQ-UBTVQH15, specifically the line mentioning the merge.

Finally, I checked for any ambiguities. I scanned other resolutions for any other "Xã Phú Bình" in other provinces, to avoid confusion.  I found a few mentions of "Xã Phú Bình" in Đồng Nai, Thái Nguyên, and Tuyên Quang provinces, but those are clearly unrelated. There is one other "xã Phú Bình" in An Giang, but it appears in the same resolution in a different line.  Since the merging of "Xã Phú Bình" to "Bình Thạnh Đông" is specific, and explicit in the resolution, I can assign a "high" confidence level to this finding.

citation.header: 1654/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh An Giang
citation.line: 11. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Hiệp Xương, Phú Bình và Bình Thạnh Đông thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Bình Thạnh Đông.
